alert.note: Alert for Pleasants; Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:35AM EST until January 10 at 8:12PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following counties, Pleasants and Tyler. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of larger creeks and streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 831 AM EST, Minor flooding along creeks and streams continues across the warned area, including at Little along Middle Island Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Marys, Middlebourne, Paden City, Sistersville, Friendly, Wick, Arvilla, Point Lookout and Hebron. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
